mapper.sql: SELECT F.FCLTS_NO, F.FCLTS_NM, F.FCLTS_NMPR, F.FCLTS_PURPS, B.BULD_NO, B.BULD_NM FROM FACILITIES F JOIN BUILDING B ON F.BULD_NO = B.BULD_NO ORDER BY B.BULD_NO,F.FCLTS_NM
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM RNUM ,F.FCLTS_NO, F.FCLTS_NM, F.FCLTS_NMPR, F.FCLTS_PURPS, B.BULD_NO, B.BULD_NM FROM FACILITIES F JOIN BUILDING B ON F.BULD_NO = B.BULD_NO WHERE F.FCLTS_NO = #{fcltsNo}
SELECT B.BULD_NO , BULD_NM , CLG_NM FROM BUILDING B LEFT OUTER JOIN COLLEGE C ON (B.CLG_NO = C.CLG_NO)
